EmailTemplate.description: This email goes to opportunities that are marked unqualified after the contract has been signed.
EmailTemplate.name: Unqualified Opportunity
EmailTemplate.subject: Cash Advance Status - {!Opportunity.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your application to RapidAdvance. We appreciate your interest in our merchant cash advance product.
We have carefully reviewed your application and have determined that you are not qualified for a RapidAdvance merchant cash advance at this time.
Your advance was unqualified for the following reason:
{!Opportunity.Unqualified_Reason__c}
We regret that we are unable to serve you at this time. Should your circumstances change we would be happy to reconsider your application.
Sincerely,
RapidAdvance Credit Department
